label: usedChemical
comment: Any clearly defined substance having a defined molecular composition.

rangeIncludes.comment: Any clearly defined substance having a defined molecular composition.

domainIncludes.comment: Any substance such as dyestuffs, chrome oxide, acids, sulphate, surfactant or other chemicals applied to an agricultural field, substrate, plant, animal product, material or product.
A process of applying a chemical, physical, or biological agent to an object.
A substance from which something is or could be made.
